title: Digitize old film with this Kodak film and slides scanner, now under $170!
content:
Macworld

If you’ve got a loved one sitting on a treasure trove of old film negatives, slides, and other priceless family artifacts, help them preserve those memories with a gift like the Kodak Slide N Scan Digital Film Scanner. Through November 9th, it’s only $169.97 (reg. $224) with code KODAK!

The state-of-the-art tech boasts quick-feeding tray technology, making it easy to load slides and films. The Slide N Scan can scan color and B&W negatives (135, 110, 126) and 50 mm slides (135, 110, 126), digitally preserving physical memories and allowing users to enhance them.

Images will spring to life on the scanner’s crystal-clear 5-inch LCD, and you can enhance image resolution from 14 to 22 megapixels for more detailed and clear images. You can even adjust the color, rotate images, and more to ensure your memories are digitized in stunning condition. 

You can also hook up the Kodak Slide N Scan directly to your TV, PC, or Mac to enjoy your digitized memories on a larger screen. No wonder it has a 4.4 out of 5-star rating on Amazon!

This holiday season, gift yourself or a loved one the Kodak Slide N Scan Digital Film Scanner for just $169.97 with code KODAK. This offer ends November 9th at 11:59pm PT!

 

Kodak Slide N Scan Film & Slide Scanner

Only $169.97 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.
